name: SE2
description: For almost twenty years, Zinnia has brought together insurance experts with entrepreneurs from the fields of technology and data science to deliver new products for the life and annuities industry. We have invested in our technology platforms and capabilities and innovated to deliver full-stack digital services. Zinnia will build on these innovations – creating brand-new products and value-add data capabilities. We’re focused on transforming the life and annuity industry from end to end so that the experience is exceptional for everyone: consumers, advisors, insurers, and reinsurers.
features: A Focus on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion
Headline: Zinnia simplifies buying, selling, and administering insurance.
ShortDescription: Our technology solutions, marketplace offerings, and TPA services enable end-to-end insurance experiences for consumers, advisors, and insurers.
enhanced_description: SE2 is an HR technology solution, part of Zinnia's offerings, designed to enhance employee experiences. It focuses on critical areas such as fostering employee well-being, promoting work-life harmony, and championing diversity, equity, and inclusion. Categorized under Total Rewards, SE2 also provides functionalities typically found in performance management and employee recognition software. Its primary objective is to improve overall employee happiness and engagement through features like employee benefits administration and structured employee recognition programs.
key_use_cases: Supporting diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives
Boosting overall employee happiness and engagement
roi_benefits: Stronger diversity, equity, and inclusion within the workforce
